repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This seems little unknown text. Title of the commentary is not mentioned only vyākhyā is mentioned on 1v. This is Sanskrit commentary on the Prakrit Poem Setubandha which is also known as Rāvaṇavaho.

msItem.title: Setubandhavyākhyā
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 ṇamaha ava(2 syllables crossed out.) ḍḍhi atuṃgaṃ avasāri avittha am aṇoṇa agahiraṃ . āpalahu aparisaṇhaṃ aṇā aparamattha pāaḍaṃ mahumahaṇa .. karakṛti kava
1v 2 rbakamuraṃ bihaṇa harati anavajaṇīḥ kahuvaṇa . ṇaṃdaṃ . (1 crossed syllable.) vaṇamahamākugo vipaṇa aparaṃ vasavibaṃbiniparivāryaṃ rājñaḥ pravāse tasya nidhānaṃ
1v 3 yaśa (1 crossed out syllable.) so mahat. kāvyaṃ seturiti khyātaṃ . vyākhyātuṃ prayatāmahevidvāṃso bahavo hyasya vyākhyānāni pracakri(2 letters crossed out.)re na tairapya
msItem.explicit: 244v 5 ataśāvasalīlapuryyamāṇaṃ tadīmukhadharaṇidharassuvelaḥ pratihatyamāna pratiravandīm . mukheṣu āhatyamāna pratiravaṃ yathā ? śatisma? ṇīṃ jī avanidhuramahau

extent.measure: 3 blank folio 2 guard folio and 244 written

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin sometimes Tamil letters are used for foliation.

handNote.desc: Hand writing is readable. Some shapes are confusing like ḍ, or sa/ ha.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

listBibl.bibl:
kāvyamālā Series 47
The śetubandha of Pravarasena with the commentary of śrīrāmādāsa Bhūpati Edi by Paṇḍita Śivadatta and Kāśinātha Pāṇḍuraṅga Parab Revised by Wāsudeva Lakṣmaṇaśāstri Paṇaśīkara Published Pāṇḍuraṅga Jiwaji Nirnayasagara Press Bomaby 1935 (Republished by Bharatiya Vidya prakshan Varanasi 1982)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
